name: workflows_tutorials
title: Workflows tutorials
description: The **Workflows Tutorials** template is a comprehensive guide designed to enhance your experience with Okta Workflows. This resource demonstrates the powerful automation capabilities of flows to both beginners and advanced users. Integrating this template into your Okta preview organization gives you access to sample users and a suite of flows showing the versatility and efficiency of Okta Workflows.
